original_title: Janek z kopalni Wujek. Film o górniku z Koszalina
overview: He was tall, athletic. He liked to swim, worked as a lifeguard on the beach, wanted to get married. A fictionalized documentary about 21-year-old Jan Stawisiński, who was fatally shot by ZOMO during the bloody pacification of the Wujek mine in Katowice on December 16, 1981.
title: Janek z kopalni Wujek. Film o górniku z Koszalina
